name: SCIENCEMUSEUM
0:
”Alexa open Science Museum”
”Start the Science Museum quiz”
”Alexa tell us about Isaac Newton from Science Museum”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: science museum
des: Science Museum contains information on the discoveries of over fifteen famous scientists --- from Ada Lovelace who invented computer processing to Emmett Chapelle who discovered bioluminescence. Users can either ask Science Museum about the scientists and their discoveries or start a quiz.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
